title: Ninety nine bottles of beer
creator_credit: Los Angeles County Film Unit, Board of Supervisors and the Commission on Alcoholism, Don Horter and C. Michael McCulloch
brief_description: A remarkable film for young people…about young people…on alcohol abuse. The film simply relates actual experiences and feelings of young people as they relate to alcohol. No authoritarian viewpoint is exhibited thus permitting the audience to arrive at their own conclusions.
